belongs_to_collection.name: Icon Male's Forgive Me Father Series

overview: Gorgeous Roman Todd is a sinister priest who can't resist his sexy male parishioners. After seducing troubled street kid Armond Rizzo, the hot priest develops an insatiable need for vulnerable male flesh. When older married man (Brendan Cage) confesses his secret desire for other men, Roman agrees to provide some "one on one" counselling that leaves the desperate older bottom begging for more. Meanwhile, young priests Michael Del Ray and Justin Dean indulge in secret, mutual masturbation that leads to intense, passionate sex. Will Father Roman use their scandalous secret to his own lustful benefit?
tagline: His sacred vows were no match for his sexual hunger
title: Forgive Me Father 5
